Class GeneiousOAIUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.geneious.GeneiousOAIUtil

  • public class GeneiousOAIUtil
extends Object
    Provides common functionality for Geneious OAI repositories.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman
